Nkemdilim Onyali-Omagbemi (née Onyali, a mụrụ ya n'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ ọsọ, ọ bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Olimpik ugboro ise n'afọ 1988 - 2004
O ritere ọla nchara na 4 × 100 m relay na 1992 Olympic Games na 200 m na 1996 Olympic Games
O nwetakwara mmeri na 1994 Commonwealth Games 100 mita title.
Onyali-Omagbemi rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma karịsịa na All-Africa Games, na-emeri ngụkọta nke ihe nrite asaa n'otu n'otu na sprints dị mkpirikpi
O meriri 100m na 1991, 1995 na 2003 wee nweta ọla nchara na 1987
E nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na 200m n'afọ 1987, 1995 na 2003
Ọzọkwa, ndị otu 4 × 100 m relay nke Naijiria meriri agbụrụ niile n'etiti 1987 na 2003, na African Games.

Egwuregwu Olympic ya n'usoro site na 1988 ruo 2004 mere ka ọ bụrụ onye Naijiria mbụ na-asọmpi na egwuregwu Olympic ise. Ndị na-egwu tenis table bụ Bose Kaffo na Segun Toriola nwekọrọ ihe omume a afọ anọ ka e mesịrị na Beijing, PR China.
Mary Onyali-Omagbemi na-eje kwa ozi ugbu a dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche (Technical) nye onye isi nchịkwa nke National Sports Commission na Naịjirịa, ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke kọmitii ndụmọdụ maka Mahadum Egwuregwu nke Naịjiria, Idumuje-Ugboko.
